overview:
Michael Vann is a Principal with The Vann Group, a provider of outsourced professional services such as accounting/bookkeeping, human resources, recruiting and strategic advisory services to small/mid-size businesses. Within the Vann Group, he serves as its Business Architect and is responsible for developing the framework of the Group’s offerings and the go-to-market strategies. In addition to these duties he is responsible for the day-to-day operations of the Group’s strategic advisory services and merger/acquisition activities where he serves as the trusted adviser to several of the Groupâ€™s key clients.

Driven by a passion that is fueled by helping companies understand the approach of transforming from what is to what can be achieved, Mike has a knack for redefining and challenging commonly held perceptions and creating a strategy to achieve success.
